document_data.name: Londal Fen
document_data.mainbody: '''Londal Fen''' was a male [[Chondathan]] [[human]] [[fighter]] in [[Wheloon]] in [[Cormyr]] in [[1374 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1374 DR, Londal and his partner, [[Smile]], were employed by Lady [[Naedaenya Arthas|Arthas]] of the [[Temple of Mystra (Wheloon)|Temple of Mystra]]. If adventurers investigating the strange behavior of the [[cleric]]s of [[Mystra]] there attacked the temple, then she would pay the pair 830 [[gp]] to ambush them. Londal and Smile would lure the adventurers into an ambush among the waterfront warehouses at [[23 Impil Street]], or otherwise keep tabs on them to ambush and murder them out of sight.
document_data.Description: Londal was a large man. Before battle, he painted his skin and armor entirely gray, leaving the whites of his eyes to stand out.
document_data.Equipment: Londal wielded a ''+1 [[greatsword]]'', wore [[full plate]] armor, and carried three ''[[potion]]s of [[bull's strength]]''.
document_data.Abilities: Londal was a specialist in the greatsword, and a powerful, brutal fighter with it.
document_data.Personality: He was a fanatical follower of [[Shar]], willing to fight to the death.
